pages.text: A Vault can be ran together with others. This is done by simply entering the $(l)same$() Vault $(l)portal$() as another player.$(br2)Upon $(l)unaliving$() in a Vault, a $(l:game_mechanics/spirits)$(l)spirit$() spawns at the player's location, given they're not the last remaining in the Vault.$(br2)Once a player leaves the Vault, they $(l)can't rejoin$().

pages.title: Parties
pages.text: $(br)Running with others is made easier with parties.$(br2)A party can be created and managed through $(l:useful_commands/party_commands)$(t:Party Commands)$(l)commands$().$(br2)The members of the party and their $(l)health$() are shown in the HUD on the $(l)right$() side of the screen.
